alert.note: Alert for Chilton; Coosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 4:58PM CDT until August 06 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CHILTON AND COOSA COUNTIES... At 458 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Parkdale to near Rockford to near Higgins Ferry Park, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clanton, Goodwater, Rockford, Kellyton, Equality, Stewartville, Hanover, Lyle, Pentonville, Dollar, Bradford, Cottage Grove, Bentleyville, Moriah, Hatchet, Nixburg, Speed, Mitchell Lake, Highway 9 and Highway 22 and Parkdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
